duties_responsibilities.duty: Collect samples of products and raw materials for laboratory analysis from various transfer points.
Label sample containers with identifying data and deliver them to the laboratory.
Perform preparation of samples, reduction, and division of appropriate sizes for analysis.
Ensure all equipment and containers are organized, cleaned, and comply with safety procedures.
Adhere to internal standards, policies, and procedures regarding sample handling.
Follow directions to ensure accurate and timely completion of tasks.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent (knowledge in barge drafting preferred)
